input.sentences: i made a lot of food for our dessert party tonight .
i have butter on a plate .
i put the chocolate chips on the beans .
output.sentences: I'm making a unique dessert tonight that has a lot of sweetness.
The first thing to do is to melt the butter on a plate.
Add sugar and syrup to make the beans sweet.
Put the entire bowl of chocolate chips on top of the beans.
This dessert is better than chocolate cake!
